title: epi2me-labs/wf-bam-merge
description: BAM file merging workflow using samtools merge/cat.

input.title: Input Options
input.description: Parameters for finding and handling input data for analysis.

bam.description: BAM or unaligned BAM (uBAM) files to use in the analysis.
bam.help_text: This accepts one of four cases: (i) the path to a single BAM file; (ii) the path to a folder containing BAM files; (iii) the path to a folder containing one level of sub-folders which in turn contain BAM files; (iv) the path to a MinKNOW experiment folder containing sub-folders for each sequenced sample.

alignment_status.description: Specify whether input BAM files are aligned or unaligned.
alignment_status.help_text: This parameter determines the merging method: 'aligned' uses samtools merge (coordinate-based), 'unaligned' uses samtools cat (simple concatenation).

samples.title: Sample Options
samples.description: Parameters that relate to samples such as sample sheets and sample names.

sample_sheet.description: A CSV file used to map barcodes to sample aliases.
sample_sheet.help_text: The sample sheet is a CSV file with, minimally, columns named `barcode` and `alias`. Extra columns are allowed.

sample.description: A single sample name for singleplexed data.
sample.help_text: For multiplex data, this will limit analysis to the single named sample.

output.title: Output Options
output.description: Parameters for saving and naming workflow outputs.

out_dir.description: Directory for output of all workflow results.
